“I can’t use my hair to escape...but I don’t have to...You have to save me...” You said as stepped closer to the window.

Fredrick got worried as he stood up on all fours inching closer to you ready to catch your hair.

However before he could react you turned around your back facing the window as you let your hair down and closed your eyes. Letting your arms out freely you suddenly lept from the window no support to save you...

Fredrick panicked as you leapt to what seemed like your doom. With an inhuman leapt he leapt from the tower after you using his inhuman speed to fall faster as he landed on the ground mear seconds before you were about to hit the ground. Leaping out he dove as you barely landed into his hands.....

Opening your eyes your feet touched the soft grass as you sighed happily as Fredrick looked to you with a stern look.

“I’m sorry...I know your instincts make you pull me back up by the hair. I realized the only way out was by removing it from the equation.” You said petting him gently.

Fredrick looked mad, putting yourself in such danger did not please him.

Finally touching the soft grass even naked as you were the freedom you felt was more than worth it. It was a beautiful warm spring day out and the pure green grass meadow lay before you.

Taking your first steps out of the tower in weeks you felt a tug as Fredrick had your braid in his teeth.

“I’m sorry Fredrick. I don’t care what she does to me anymore. She had taken both of our lives away at this point and we deserve more. I’m leaving I don’t care if I’m naked forever! We are going to find a way to remove our curses and go home!” You stated proud.

Fredrick paused for a second....he didn’t want to go out there. The world was scary place and for a cursed werewolf and a naked princess it wouldn’t be any easier. However he was still sworn to protect you...

Lowering his head he released your braid as he began to follow you giving an approving barking noise as his tail began to wag.

Leaving the meadows behind you embarked on your first adventure in this messed up fairy tale adventure you were now in.
1443222111212111.title: Waking up

14432221112121111.content:
"Well, if the woods got me into this mess, they're probably my best bet for getting out of it. Come on, Freddie!" you motioned for Frederick to follow you, and he did.

You felt terrible that the entire reason Frederick was cursed like this was because of you. No! Because of Rapunzel! Just cause you looked like her, didn't make you her, you had to remember that. All you had to do was make it to the end of the story somehow, and you'd be able to transform back to normal... you think. That's usually how these things worked, right? Then again, nothing about the situation was anything resembling usual.

Walking barefoot and naked with miles of hair was not a pleasant walk, even less so when you're in a dark wood, though with Frederick to protect you, you weren't afraid of getting attacked by anyone. You were however afraid of getting snagged on something, or stepping on something sharp.

"Is there anything through here?" you pointed ahead of you.

Frederick just shrugged and kept walking.

You started to feel the tiredness and pain from all the walking as you leaned against a tree for support. Frederick continued on for a few moments, before rushing back and motioning forwards. You quickly rushed to see what he had found, discovering:
14432221112121111.title: Into the woods

choices: You ask the locals for help
The son of the town’s lord sees you
144322211121211111.content:
You were tired and exhausted getting through the woods naked dragging your hair was not something you were prepared for. You were able to actually ride Freddie for awhile but you felt guilty and decided to walk the rest of the way.

Fortunately after quite awhile you saw a small clearing in the distance. It was a small town. Medieval in design and mostly small homesteads and farms. A simple village with simple people.

“You need to stay in the woods Freddie. Simple farmers like this will try to attack you if they see a large wolf.” You said petting his head gently.

Fredrick whimpered and whined a bit but lowered his head understanding as he turned around went to the woods.

While your current punishment curse was preventing you from wearing any clothes you had to at least make yourself presentable. You took enough locks of your hair to cover your private’s and at least show a hint of modesty. It didn’t help that you were still a naked woman walking alone in a mall medieval farming town.
144322211121211111.title: A small medieval town

choices: Morgan offers to use her training to try to reverse the curse
Morgan offers to join your travels
1443222111212111111.content:
Naturally, there were stares. Even without your wolf companion, the sight of, by your own admission, a very pretty woman walking naked through town turned quite a few heads, male and female. Unfortunately, no one seemed to want to engage with you at first, likely out of sheer shock.

It was mortifying to feel the gaze of so many people staring directly at you. Even with the hair covering up key areas, it didn't leave much to the imagination.

You started trying to piece together what everything was, despite your memory having been supplanted in regards to Frederick, you were still a modern 21st century man on the inside, and this medieval setting was causing a bit of culture shock. What if these people spoke a dialect that you couldn't? You were hoping to find an inn or a tavern, but there weren't any signs around, and no one dared come near you for you to ask for directions.

Thankfully, you got reassurance sooner rather than later.

"My word! You have to cover up, dear!" a kindly, heavyset woman rushed up to you and draped a blanket over your shoulders, which quickly disintegrated into nothingness.

"Magicks!" the woman whispered, grabbing your arm and pulling you into a nearby house.

She shut the door and closed the windows, before pushing you down into a chair.

"Be you a witch?" she asked.

"No!" you assured her. "I am no witch. But I was cursed by one. I don't know how long it'll last, but I am not permitted to wear clothes."

"If I hadn't seen it with my own eyes..." she started. "I am Morgan. I'm a sorceress in training. When the blanket vanished, I thought that you might be another magic-user. My grandmother was teaching me, but she's passed on, so I'm seeking a new teacher."

"I wish I could help. I'm actually looking for someone with magic knowledge. There's my curse, which I need lifted, and then there's a friend of mine who was cursed far more horribly than I am." you explained.

You gave her the rundown of your story, leaving out the bit about being a man from the future/real world, since you knew that part might make her mistrust you.

"Trapped in a tower your whole life?" Morgan remarked. "I can't imagine how hard that was."

"I don't even know what I'm really looking for. Freedom, I guess." you said.

"Well, I don't know if I can give you freedom, but..." Morgan started.
1443222111212111111.title: You ask the locals for help

1443223.content:
Perhaps you see a grand castle?

Or a small cottage?
1443223.title: Something else

144323.content:
BabeCrate: Based on MissSimone's concept, (https://sta.sh/093flk3uuf7) a monthly crate featuring enchanted clothes is sent to an unsuspecting gentleman and he's compelled to use the crate to transform into that month's woman.

Conforming to the Costume: At a Halloween party, the guests find themselves transforming into whatever their costume was. For some men, this leads to bigger changes.
144323.title: Something else

choices: Jennifer, a busty blonde working at a coffee shop
April, a redhead with an amazing body working as a secretary
1443231.content:
Jesse Richards was a fairly average 25 year old single guy. He lived by himself in a single bedroom apartment with no pets. He worked full time at a large company call center doing IT work and customer service.

He had never been very successful with women pretty much all his life. While he wasn’t a virgin or anything, he had a couple girlfriends in his past, things never seemed to work out for him. Right now he felt like he was stuck in a rut, just a simple cycle of work, home, and sleep.

However all that changed one day as he came home from work...

Jesse was coming home one day when he saw a package waiting for him at his door. He hadn’t ordered anything so he was a bit suspicious. The package was decent sized, and weighed a decent amount. It wasn’t heavy but there was definitely some solid stuff in here.

Shrugging it off Jesse took the package inside and opened it up. It was addressed to him so maybe he had just forgotten about something he purchased online. As he opened the box he saw a note on top of the stuff inside. It was written in huge bright letters with a header reading. “Read Me First!”

Taking the note Jesse read it to himself.

“Welcome to BabeCrate! You have been chosen to the newest member of our amazing monthly service! Inside you will find clothes and a profile for first months Babe. Simply put on the clothes and you find your life magically changing all around you! For the next month experience a whole new life and new perspective. In another month a new crate will arrive with a new profile in it. Simply switch into the new clothes and a new babe’s life will be available to you for the next month. Repeat this process as many times as you like!

Disclaimer! If you fail to change into a new babe after a month or refuse to turn back to normal during our select “reversal” period, then the changes will become permanent.

Thank you and welcome to BabeCrate!”

Jesse couldn’t help but laugh as he read the note. This had to be the most elaborate joke he had ever seen. Who would believe such a thing honestly?

Just thinking about that brought Charles back to himself, flexing his fingers a bit. Honestly, aside from being a girl, nothing felt out of the ordinary. The "anime-ness" of everything didn't make it feel any less normal, as if it was natural. The silver hair didn't seem like it was dyed at all, completely natural color. Admittedly, there was a certain cool factor to this, if not for how uncertain he felt about it all.

This was basically a whole new world. Whole new country. Whole new people. It made him wonder just what he could do. Well, the first thing was probably to actually get cleaned up in changed. He was still in the clothes he woke up in, which was just a bra and panties, and it was getting closer to midday with every second.

Well, best to at least try to retain some kind of normal routine. Charles figured that was the best way for now to keep himself from going nuts. Funny enough, he could feel as if his emotions were being made obvious to anyone who would be watching, just like whenever you saw an anime character get all stressed or depressed.

"This is so weird..." he said, finding it hard to find enjoyment in this yet.

So, he tried to shower up and get changed as he would typically do in the mornings. Thankfully the shower wasn't too different from normal, so that was easy once he figured out how to get the warm water. However, that's when he began to realize other things that came with being a girl. For one thing, his skin was a lot more sensitive, and the breasts were especially so. Water falling on those got him to squeak out, bouncing on his feet a little bit.

"I feel like I'm a girl in those high school animes," he mumbled to himself, trying to get himself cleaned once he calmed down. Granted, the long hair didn't make things easy either.

Getting through it was rough, but get through it he did. Eventually it came to getting himself dressed. Seemed to have quite a bit of clothing, with a lot of casual and dressy stuff. Heck, even stuff like a kimono which made him laugh a bit at the absurdity. In any case, he dressed himself up best he could, which took a little bit of time, especially given the unfamiliarity with getting a bra on.

Heck, he actually ended up crashing and having stuff fall on him, making him cry out again comically.
14432331111.title: Waking up sometime later

choices: You change and go to work
You run out of the dressing room
144323311111.content:
A sudden ringing came from a bright pink cell phone sitting on a nightstand near your new bed. The ringtone was a random J-Pop song that sounded like the intro to many different animes.

Going to the phone you noticed the name was Kiki. You had no idea who that was.

(What you didn’t notice was you were actually reading the name in Japanese yet everything appeared as though it were still in English to you)

Answering the phone you heard a sudden girl yelling at you.

“Chiharu where are you? Ayana-San is pissed! You were supposed to be here two hours ago! Are you coming in today!” She said in a really fast talking voice.

“Uhh...yeah I’m on my way!” You said realizing this must be your new work.

You began to scramble tossing on some jeans and a basic top and shoes as you scrambled out the door. You looked like an adorable yet clumsy mess as you hustled outside.

What was weird was you had no idea where you were going but yet you knew exactly where you were going...You had never seen any of this stuff before yet you knew the exact train to take and which stop to get off at. It seemed somewhere in the back of your mind this information you needed was there somewhere.

When you finally got to your new work you suddenly paused and almost fell over...

“Happy Time Bikini Karaoke Bar!” The building said above it with the image of a smiling cartoon cat giving a peace sign.

“Oh no...” You said poking your head through the doors to see what was going on.

It was a brightly karaoke bar with several really cute severs all wearing bikinis as they took orders, delivered drinks, flirted with customers and even sang karaoke with people who paid enough.

“Hey Chiharu! Are you coming?” A voice said as you saw it was coming from the alleyway.

There was a really cute looking girl waving at you from the back door into bar. Taking a deep breath you walked over as you realized this must be Kiki.

Kiki had semi long hair that was a bright blue color. However just like your silver hair it looked totally natural and not dyed at all. She had a much more petite figure than you did and was currently wearing a bright blue bikini that matched her hair perfectly.

“There you are...the manager is furious. You remember she told us the business team was coming today! Here get dressed!” She said talking lightning fast as she suddenly hurled a tiny silver bikini at your face.

“Umm...uhh...I’m not sure if....” You tried to say just taking in this whole situation.

“No excuses!” She said grabbing you and with lightning speed like in the anime she tossed you into a dressing as she began tapping her foot waiting for you.

You stared at the bikini in your hands blushing a bright red. It was very skimpy and revealing and didn’t even seem tailored to your larger bust.
144323311111.title: Getting a call

1443233111111.content:
Your mind was having trouble just trying to keep up with it all. Somehow knowing the exact way to come here despite never being to Tokyo, dealing with such rapid talking. It was all so much to take in, which was funny given how often you saw this stuff in anime. Kiki looked very much like the young talkative girl you would always see in anime, the kind that always looked especially young for their age. The petite figure certainly sold that as well.

In any case, it really seemed like you weren't going to get out of this, and you whimpered cutely as it dawned on you. This would be great from an outside point of view, but yourself going out there all scantily-clad just seemed so embarrassing. Still, much like your trip here, you felt like you had no other choice.

"One question gets answered and a million more take its place," you mumbled as you put your stuff into a locker that had your new full name on it: Suzumiya Chiharu. Boy, seeing your name even that way was weird.

In any case, now nude again, you began to put the silver bikini on. The bottom went on well enough, though it showed more of your butt than you would have liked on yourself. The top was a different story of course, and you were barely able to slip it on. Like you expected, it was not tailored to your large bust at all, barely being contained. You wondered how in the world it was even staying on without ripping.

Then again, it was anime. Go figure. One look in the mirror and you sighed, face incredibly flushed at this.

"Oh man....why me..." you groaned.

"CHIHARU!" yelled Kiki, so much that it seemed like the whole room was shaking from the soundwave.

"I'm coming! I'm coming!" you cried out instinctively, rushing out with near inhuman speed. You ended up outside before your mind could register it.

"That's more like it!" Kiki winked, smiling a little as her mood was a little improved. "Just make sure it doesn't happen again. Ayana-san will forgive you if things go well. We've got a little more time before the business team comes in."

You felt like you should know who they are, but it didn't quite connect in your brain. Guess you would know in time.

"R-Right, sure..." you said, your face still red.

Kiki just giggled at your face before racing behind you and pushing you out again.

"Oh you. No wonder you get so many customers. Sexy one moment, and cute the next," she said. "Oh, gotta run! Don't want to get yelled at too!"

She said all of this in her lightning-fast way as usual, not before grabbing your hand and dragging you along with her. You could swear your feet had even left the ground at how fast she was moving. Was it weird to say that it didn't feel out of place even with out over the top it all looked? Yeah, probably.

Before long, Kiki had zoomed you both out to the floor. Seeing it up close, you had to adjust your eyes a little bit with how flashy it all was. It was a miracle to hear anything with how loud everything was, from all the conversation to the karaoke and everything else. Kiki didn't seem fazed of course.

"Welp, gotta run!" she giggled, patting you on the shoulder. "Good luck. See you at lunch as usual, right?"

She winked again before running off as if she already knew the answer, leaving you on your own.
1443233111111.title: You change and go to work

choices: Cheer Kiki up and go out for drinks
14432331111111.content:
Stepping out onto the work floor your body immediately froze up. The sight of all the customers, the girls in bikinis, everyone moving so fast...it was too much as you began to panic..

“I can’t do this...I can’t do this!” You said terrified to yourself.

“Yes you can...” A sudden voice said echoing in your mind back to you.

You froze for a second. Where did that voice come from? It sounded like your own but more...seductive.

It was then you began to feel something. A new sensation, a strange new burning kind of desire deep inside you. It was sexual in nature but it was so much more...It was a desire to be seen, a desire to be wanted, a desire to show off and prove you were the sexiest girl here. A desire to win...

Unable to resist this powerful calling deep inside you the only choice you had was to let out a cute little whimper and gasp of pleasure as you gave in and followed your instincts.

From there work was easy...Once you stepped onto the dance floor it was like you were a whole new person. You felt this strong sexual confidence driving you, telling you how to act.

You began your job taking orders and serving drinks, your voice was now sultry and seductive as customers couldn’t keep their eyes off of you. You could see the heat rising from them as their cheeks turned red as you brushed against them ever so slightly...

You sat next to customers and playfully flirted, playing innocent and sweet. It became clear quite quickly that you were the preferred favorite of all your co workers as more requests came through for you as more and more tips were left behind for you.

By the end of your shift after the bar closed down your manager Ayano called you over as she was counting down the till.

Ayano looked similar to a lot of mentor female types in Anime’s you can seen. She had long fiery red hair once again looking natural. She wore dark classes and a white button up blouse and black business skirt but it seemed like this was almost a parody as her body was almost comically over sexualized. Her breasts were massive, even bigger than yours as was her but and hips. Her whole body was a giant hourglass shape as she seemed to have a stern yet caring personality about her.

“You are lucky Chiharu-San...I thought about firing you today for showing up so late and being so awkward earlier. Fortunately you found yourself and made more tonight than anybody. Keep it up and don’t be late again.” She said with a stern tone handing you your share of the money.

You bowed and nodded as you went back to the locker room and immediately blushed. All the girls you worked with were naked together either showering together or changing back into their street clothes.

“You wanna shower Chiharu-San?” Kiki suddenly asked you as she was blushing a bit as she stood naked beside you.

You tried not to star as you gently nodded. You didn’t want to offend or be seen as a prude after all. You undressed quickly as hoped into hot shower together.

“How do you do it Chiharu? How do you go from being so clumsy and awkward to being so sexy and seductive? I’m honestly jealous...” Kiki said a bit depressed all of a sudden.

It was then you began to realize what was happening...You were in an anime now and this was fan service...

“I’m...uhh...not sure.” You said gently with your cute voice again. Apparently whatever seductiveness you had earlier had worn off as you felt awkward and shy again.

“Is...is...it because I’m not as pretty as you?” Kiki said a bit sad.

“I know I don’t have the biggest boobies like you but maybe I’m just not that pretty...” Kiki said as she lifted her breasts in her hands as her sadness began to grow.

You were now trapped in an awkward place. All you really wanted was to go home and figure out what was going on here. The other part felt really guilty about Kiki’s apparent lack of confidence...
14432331111111.title: Working around

144323311111111.content:
Honestly, it was hard to resist how sad Kiki looked. To an extent, you had tried to think that all this wasn't real, that everything was made up like the cartoon it was. If you thought of it like that, then it made things kind of simpler.

Yet, seeing Kiki's depressed face and clear lack of confidence made you rethink on it a little. It certainly didn't seem fake, more like you were facing someone as real as anything you knew before. It even kind of reminded you of your own bouts with confidence issues back in high school.

Come to think of it, it allowed you to take Kiki at a glance. She looked perhaps a little bit younger than you, though probably not by much. Then again, as you learned long ago, tryijg to determine ages in anime based at a glance wasn't always easy. Still, she did seem to play the part of a girl looking up at her sempai for lack of a better word. Made you wonder if her earlier excitement and rapid talking were more of an act or if it was who she was without the confidence problems.

Well, you really felt like you couldn't let this go yet. You couldn't allow her to linger on her sadness.

"I-It's not that at all!" you said, perhaps a little louder than you intended. "You're...very pretty in your own right..."

You weren't lying, but you tried to think of what else you could use to cheer her up. Okay, come on think! Kiki was busy the whole day as well. There had to be a good example that you saw as you were doing your own business.

Oh! That's it!

"Just today, you remember those School boys? There were tons of them and you did a whole music number with them!"

Yeah, Kiki had been left to cover a whole group of young boys earlier and she was a bigger hit than she gave herself credit for. The sight was absolute adorable. Plus, her singing voice was the real deal.

"Oh yeah....that...that was fun..." Kiki said, wiping away a couple tears that had fell, a small smile showing.

"Plus you...you have the best singing voice in the whole bar. No one else was even close," you smiled a little wider. "Seriously, you're beautiful too."

Kiki's face turned a little red, but she didn't seem sad or distressed. Rather, she dove and wrapped you in a big hug, surprising you a bit. She didn't even wait for you to return it, but her earlier smile was back.

"Thank you Chiharu-san," she said. "You are the best!"

You had to admit it was nice to see her happy again. Looking a sad didn't suit her looks. On that note though, that left nothing to distract you from the awkward situation of being in a shower with a lot of naked girls. It was kind of overwhelming actually, though you managed to hold it in. Didn't help when Kiki offered to wash your back, which you allowed her to do and returned the favor when she asked.

Suffice to say, it was really weird the entire time, making you glad when you got changed back into the messy clothes you came in.

"Chiharu-san," Kiki bounced over, wearing a sleeveless top and skirt. "What to go out for a drink? We can even catch dinner somewhere if you like."

Honestly, that felt great right now. After how long you just spent here, food and a drink or two would be nice. And heck, Kiki was the most familiar person you knew at the moment so why not.

"Sure...Kiki-san," you said, the suffix kind of coming out on it's own. Boy, that was weird too, getting used to actually saying that.

"Great!" Kiki giggled and clapped her hands, and you could just see the aura of happiness behind her. "Let's go!"

At that, she grabbed your hand, reinacting what happened earlier with you getting dragged out by her.
144323311111111.title: Cheer Kiki up and go out for drinks

choices: You continue to hang out at the bar
1443233111111112.content:
Kiki led you down a busy Tokyo avenue as you hustled through people bumping into others as her happy fast moving and talking self had returned.

You felt awkward going through such a busy city street at night as you felt the eyes on you wherever you went. Finally you came to your destination. There was a bright Neon sign above as you read the title.

“The Scarlet Lotus”

Outside the building was a large man wearing a dark black suit as he was determining who could get in or who had to wait in line.

As you both walked up the bouncer looked to you and eyes you both.

“You are fine...busty chick need to change.” He said pointing to you.

You realized now the price for dressing in such a messy manner. Not that you planned for any of this in the first place.

“I’m sorry...I was in such a hurry I didn’t think of going out tonight. “ You replied suddenly embarrassed at yourself.

“Well I do have a change of clothes on me.” Kiki said as she went into her purse holding up a black mini skirt and another sleeveless button up blouse.

You didn’t like the idea of wearing such an outfit in public but you did promise her.

Taking the clothes you hid in the alleyway as Kiki covered you up from wandering eyes. You slipped on the mini skirt and buttoned up the blouse.

The only problem was your new large bust wasn’t built for the smaller top Kiki wore. You could feel the buttons straining as the top few buttons suddenly popped off revealing a large valley of cleavage you were comfortable displaying.

Sighing you didn’t have much other choice as you went back to the bouncer who looked at you now with Kiki who smiled brightly as he grunted a bit and gave you both the go ahead to go inside.

Once inside the club you were amazed at how popular it was. A huge bar and dance floor playing all sorts of Japanese pop. Kiki was taking your hand as she found what she was looking for.

There was booth full of girls that you immediately recognized. It was all the girls you worked with at the bikini bar. They were all dressed up in fancy and sexy dresses and outfits with their makeup and everything all done up to the Max.

“Hey it’s Kiki! Wow look at that she brought out the Angel/Demon herself. How’s it going Arko?” One of the girls at the table said. She was a feisty looking girl with bright Violet hair wearing a very provocative looking black dress.

You remembered her...She was named...Miako...but everyone called her Mia. She was the most popular girl right after you at the bikini bar. She had a figure similar to yours with long hair and big boobs, however it seemed like her figure and size was just a tiny bit less than yours. Her boobs were just a bit smaller and her figure just a bit less hourglass shaped.She seemed to be the defacto leader of the rest of the girls. All expect Kiki who seemed more attached to you.

“Arko?” You asked confused looking to Kiki.

“It’s your nickname with the rest of the girls. It’s short for Arkosios...It means half Angel Half Devil.” Kiki whispered to you.

“Uhh...hey thanks for having me.” You said trying to be polite.

“I’m just surprised you came out, we all thought Arko was too good to hang out with us.” Mia said sipping her Martini, her words were little needles digging into you..

“Well...uh..I just wanted to have some fun and Kiki needed cheering up.” You replied trying to stay positive.

“Awww...isn’t that sweet we definitely have Angel Akro out now don’t we? It’s so hard to compete with Devil Arko...The customers just love her don’t they?” Mia said digging the knife in a bit more.

“Mia-San please...we all just came to have a good time.” Kiki said in her quiet voice as it was plain to see she and the other girls at the table were scared of Mia...

There were two other girls sitting by Mia, Haru and Iwa. Haru had short black hair cut to frame her frame perfectly and a very thin athletic build. She was a bit cold and stand off like by nature. Iwa Had bright green hair of medium length and an overall nice frame. She seemed totally bored however constantly distracted and not paying attention to much of anything around her.

The five of you girls chatted and talked for a bit. Mostly about work and guys. It seemed everyone here was single but there were always flings and flirts going on. Mia seemed like kind of a slut to you. She would joke about all the guys she has slept with recently and talk about guys more like toys and disposable pleasures. Haru barely talked and Iwa would not chime in whenever she felt like it. Mia definitely was the alpha of her little pack here. If this was an anime it was becoming clear to you she was either your rival or the villain.

The other three girls got up for a bathroom break as you leaned in and whispered to her.

“Why is everyone acting so scared of Mia? She kind of has a power complex to her...?” You asked.

“Oh:..I forgot you are new...Mia is the heiress to the company that owns our work. Her grandfather owns the company. She has gotten girls fired before she doesn’t like and even ruined their reputations so they can’t get hired anywhere good. She is threatened by you...Your beauty is almost unnatural and you do have kind of Umm...well a unique personality. You are super sweet and innocent at times but you become well...kind of a sexy demon at others. That’s why you are so popular at work. They love that dark naughty devil side.” Kiki said embarrassed to admit this to you.

You realized what was happening now. If this was an anime it your story and it was starting to form its story in place. You could see yourself, the mysterious beauty with a hidden dark talent, your best friend, your rival and her henchmen...That just meant there was a villain lurking around that had yet to reveal themselves...
1443233111111112.title: Going to another place

14432331111111121.content:
If not for the fact that you were at the center of this, you might have laughed at the irony of this whole thing. Seriously, everything you knew turned upside-down in just one day. It was weird, and perhaps ironically funny.

"Great....a rival. Just my luck," you groaned instead. This was the kind of anime you'd love to watch when you were your normal self.

"W-Well....h-hopefully it works out!" Kiki tried to say encouragingly, granted the uneasiness could be seen on her face as well. "And I'm here too right?! Even if the other girls follow her, I'll support you if anything happens!"

Well, it was certainly nice to see the girl's earlier enthusiasm back in full swing. It actually helped you to relax and smile a little bit, at least more than before. Honestly, whatever light amount of memories you had didn't give you too much on Kiki beyond what you learned today. Perhaps you'd have to learn that on the fly or something.

"Well, it's nice to have one person at least," you smiled a little wider. "You're certainly attached to me."

"Of course!" Kiki smiled, blushing a little but still looking prideful. "After what you've done for me, of course I help you."

"Hmm, like what?" you asked, your large eyes blinking.

"You didn't forget did you?" Kiki raised a finger. "Just a little while after you joined, you actually defended me from Mia-san. She was picking on me because of my....well, size."

Somehow, something about that seemed to tickle in your brain, witnessing Mia harassing Kiki, practically bringing her to tears in the process. But then you came in like some knight in shining armor, or shiny bikini, whatever. Somehow, none of this seemed surprising to you given what you had witnessed today, and Kiki seemed to become your best friend ever since.

A nice little tale, if a little cliche. Still, you smiled a bit, even giggling softly after Kiki stopped talking.

"That's nice...Kiki-san," you said, still getting used to that. "I appreciate it."

Honestly, the three other girls had been in the bathroom for a while, though you figured Mia probably wouldn't be disappointed if you both were gone by the time she came back. Besides, you and Kiki had already gone through some drinks and she was beginning to look wobbly. Actually, it was incredibly adorable how loopy she was looking.

"Say, how about we get out before the princess arrives?" you smiled a little more.

"Sure!" Kiki sing-sang a bit. "You know, there's somewhere I'd like to show you if you're interested. It looks wonderful at this time of night."
14432331111111121.title: You continue to hang out at the bar

choices: You Drop Kiki off and go home
144323311111111211.content:
Kiki was definitely a bit drunk now. She wobbled with with almost every step and hiccuped and laughed at just about everything. What was weird was you felt nothing...You drank just as much as she did but you didn’t have a minor buzz.

Kiki took you away from the main city and into a park. It was a beautiful traditional Japanese Zen Garden with sand pits and bamboo and beautiful arches.

“I come here to get away...it’s so peaceful here..it’s nice.” Kiki said her attitude turning a bit sad.

“What’s wrong?” You asked seeing her bright attitude vanish.

“It’s just...I’m sorry....you should know...I haven’t been very honest with you.” Kiki said nervous.

“What do you mean?” You asked nervously.

“It’s just...well...I’m the one who started calling you Arko-San at work! When you first started I was so jealous. When your...well...dark side...or whatever comes out at work. It’s so hard to deal with. Many of us at the bar started to get jealous and angry at all the attention and tips you were getting.” Kiki said as big bubbly tears were building in her eyes giving that way over the top anime sad face you were used to.

“Please forgive me!” She said crying little waterfalls as she suddenly buried her face in your boobs as you tried to push her off. However being in an anime it was like she was vice gripped to you as you shook her around your boobs jiggling and bouncing around.

You finally managed to calm her down. “It’s okay...I don’t mind...In fact I kinda like it.” You told her with a smirk.

“Huh?” Kiki asked confused.

“It’s kinda intimidating...I like it. If Mia thinks she can run things without a challenge I will show her up.” You said with a proud stance.

Kiki jumped up excited as she began to wobble as it obvious she needed to go home.
144323311111111211.title: Going with Kiki

1443233111111112111.content:
Smiling a little, you let Kiki lean on you a bit as you escorted her to her apartment. It was a bit aways away from your own, but not too far. Getting there was no problem at all, and you allowed her to let herself inside.

"Thanks Chiharu-san," she smiled widely. "See ya!"

"Bye," you waved a little back before she closed the door completely.

With that done, you began to follow your brain on the path back to your apartment. Funny how relying on such a thing felt so natural after just one day. Guess it was because you were using it so often. Still, as weird as things were, it honestly wasn't too bad. Being a girl didn't help but it was an interesting experience.

The train ride back home allowed you time to think on things. How did you end up here? That fortune cookie must have had something in it after all. It couldn't be coincidence. Made you wonder just what that old sensei guy was up to when he gave it to you. Furthermore, how would you be able to get home? Or was there any way at all?

Well, it didn't seem like those answers would come anytime soon. You sighed as you got off the train, making your way back home. Still, you had to admit that the place looked really nice. You looked out over the lights of the Tokyo skyline, and boy was it a beauty to look at. Perhaps it was anime, but dang did it look cool.

"Guess it's not all bad," you smiled a little, before getting to your apartment.

From there, you just settled in, suddenly exhausted from how the day went. Guess that was how things were so long as you were here. You turned on the TV for a little bit, not even caring about how all the Japanese seemed so natural to you, before beginning to turn in. You wished you could cover up a bit more, but you guessed the bra and panties would have to do for sleep wear. At least you would keep cool during the night.

And, with the day's events fresh in your mind, you fell right asleep.
1443233111111112111.title: You Drop Kiki off and go home

choices: You feel a strange dark presence within you
14432331111111121111.content:
You actually woke up this morning on time getting up your alarm and getting ready for the day. It was weird for you adjusting to such a new morning routine. It took way longer than before between showering, make up, and getting dressed you.

You dressed in a bright blue sundress with matching wedge sandals. You honestly thought you were one of the cutest and sexiest anime girls you had ever seen as you winked at your reflection and giving yourself a peace sign.

You checked your schedule and saw it was your day off so you wanted to spend the day exploring Tokyo and seeing this new beautiful anime world for yourself.

As you went for the door you suddenly paused...It was like you were suddenly frozen as your body refused to move...

“You haven’t forgotten our deal have you?” A sudden dark sounding voice echoed into your mind.

“What....what is this...:?” You said trying to fight back but to no avail.

You managed to look back at yourself in the mirror as you suddenly let out a loud yelling noise as you saw your bright blue eyes suddenly flash a deep dark blood red color...

The scare and shock actually managed to cause you to fall over as you shook your head. You were able to move again as you didn’t notice anything else out of place. You shook your head trying to clear your thoughts as you left your apartment.

You had actually texted Kiki before leaving. Since she was supposed to be your friend in this new anime life you figured a day out shopping and living it up was now in order.
14432331111111121111.title: Next Day

144323311111111211111.content:
Before you left, you actually looked in the mirror for a bit, satisfying your own curiosity. You made a whole lot facial expressions, and actually laughed a bit when you could even see symbols around you that signified emotion, just like in every anime ever practically. Heck, you even made a "shocked" face that would be completely impossible in real life. It really showed you just how out there all of this was, and yet you seemed to be getting a hang on it despite only being here a short time.

Leaving your apartment, it was weird how directions just seemed to come to you. Granted, it certainly made things a whole lot easier. Imagine if you had been here with no sense what so ever?

"Guess I'll take what I can," you shrugged, before getting on the train.

The train wasn't too busy this time, so you had some room to yourself. In the meantime, you had time to think for yourself. Honestly, you wondered if things were going to get even more hectic soon. If this really was an anime, and from what you had already seen, some kind of plot was in the works, meaning you might get into even more crazy situations and not for the best. Being the protagonist sounded great and all, but living it instead of just watching meant the potential danger could be all the more real.

You sighed as you looked out over Tokyo.

"I just hope I don't get myself killed," you mumbled.

Well, hopefully this could take your mind off of things. As the train got to a different stop this time, your mind seemed to lead you towards the mall that Kiki had replied you both try out first. It certainly seemed like a great opportunity to learn more about Kiki and this world in general. If things might get rough, actually having a grip on things instead of relying on instinct would be helpful.

"Chiharu-san!"

You nearly jumped out of your skin as you suddenly got dramatically hugged from behind, a loud giggle filling the air as you ended up spinning a bit. You got a little dizzy from it, to it you just heard more laughter. Settling down, you looked around to see Kiki, which giggling. She was wearing a nice dress as well, which was pink in color. She had sandals as well, though hers lacked the heeled parts. Still, she looked adorable all the same. She even had her hair done up in a cute pair of twin ponytails.

"Surprised to see me?" she giggled still, seeing your reaction.

"That was....a little surprising yes," you sighed, smoothing out the sundress.

Apparently this over abundance of sexuality in society all stems from the greatest difference between your world and this one. It is because of some called...”The Blossoming.”

At first you had no idea what this term meant but upon doing some research you found out exactly what it was.

The Blossoming is a physical transformation that’s affects all human women in this world. Apparently it’s a like a super Puberty effect that triggers in women right around adulthood. There is no exact timer on when but it usually affect young women right around their 18th year.

During The Blossoming a woman’s body undergoes a remarkable transformation rapidly developing in all sexual characteristics. Their busts grow, their hips widen, everything about them sexually drastically increases.

This explains why there is such hierarchy and caste system amongst women in this world. Because The Blossoming is not an exact science the effects of it vary greatly from woman to woman.

Some people like your rival Mia were blessed with an amazing Blossoming and became sexual goddesses while others barely had any effect on them at all. This explains why Mia is so revered and power driven, as with many people their status goes to their head.

This also explains why you are the protagonist of this Anime. She was unattractive even by normal standard and left alone by most of society. However all that changed after her Blossoming.

When Chiharu Blossomed she became the absolutely amazing sex dream that were now. Even by this world’s standards your appearance stood out. Not only that before the Blossoming Chiharu had dark brown hair, now it was a pure silvery white. Something that you haven’t found on anyone anywhere else.

This incredibly abnormal Blossoming is what has led to Chiharu’s nickname of Arko. Meaning half Angel half demon. She looks like an Angel now practically perfect in appearance but there is something dark inside her. Something that makes her an absolute sexual monster, yet it has never fully come out. This is why many are so afraid of you.

Kiki it seemed didn’t care about all these stories and rumors. She seemed mostly focused on just being your friend. You were able to learn something interesting about Kiki during your time together. Kiki is what is known as a late bloomer. Even though she is in her early 20’s she hasn’t blossomed yet.

This explains her petite body and small breasts, also her shyness and insecureness, because many of the other girls tease her about it. Treating her like a child and demeaning her.

Oh, and Kiki hadn't stopped talking all throughout this adventure so far. Seemed like she was a real mix of energetic yet shy. On the one hand, it was an easy mistake that anyone could make, and on the other hand, the guards should have been watching the doors more closely. That was how Eli ended up in the mansion kneeling on the ground, with his wrists bound, staring at the business end of a pretty sharp looking axe as dozens of attractive women in ceremonial robes looked on.

"Listen, my car broke down and the door was open! I was just looking for a phone!" Eli explained.

"You have interrupted an important ceremony. When the stars and planets align this way, once every month, the Sisterhood must gather and perform the ritual. No man is permitted to be in our presence until after the ritual is completed." the leader, her hood pulled back, exposing her auburn hair, her outstretched hand the only thing keeping the axe from falling onto Eli's neck.

"So I'll just go back the way I came and forget everything I've seen. In fact, I've forgotten it already." Eli shut his eyes tightly. "Wow! An empty mansion! I think I'll keep looking for help!"

"Our scripture dictates that any man who enters during the forbidden hour must be put to death." the leader said.

"Ulp..." Eli was speechless. They couldn't be serious... could they?

"Joanna..." one of the robed women started. "Isn't there another way? This hasn't happened in my entire time with the Sisterhood. I don't believe it's right."

"It's in the books! We must follow them, Rosalind!" Joanna insisted.

The pleading looks of the other women, along with Eli's own pleading look caused Joanna to turn away.

"Lock him in another room! We must consult the scripture before judgement is passed!" Joanna ordered.

Eli was dragged away, and Joanna quickly walked to the library, poring over the books that dictate the actions of the Sisterhood. For the sake of herself, and her sisters, she hoped it has a solution.

14432332221.content:
This entire ordeal had happened because of the utterance of a single sentence, one that you'd come to regret over the coming days. That sentence was:

"Come on! Another rom-com?" you exclaimed as you walked into the living room of the apartment you shared with your girlfriend, Holly. "How many of these can you watch?"

"I happen to like them. And if I can sit through every one of those action movies you like, you might be able to learn how to stop criticizing the movies I like." Holly said.

"Fat chance. At least the stuff I like have variety. These are all the same movie with different actors." you remarked. "Some girl who works a soulless job has all her problems saved once she finds a man!"

"They're not all like that, Dennis!" Holly insisted.

"What's this one about, eh?" you asked.

"...An unappreciated receptionist who finds love during her hometown's harvest festival. But that doesn't mean you have to be a dick about it!"

"I'm not being a dick! I just can't understand how you can watch this dreck!"

"Fine, I'll finish it after you go to bed." Holly sighed. "Pass me the remote."

She pointed to the coffee table, where the remote was sitting. You picked it up and immediately dropped it, shaking your hand.

"Ouch! Damn thing shocked me!" you shouted.

"Are you okay?" Holly asked.

"Yeah, I guess the battery shorted out." you replied, picking the remote up again, without being shocked. You held it out to Holly. "Be careful."

She took the remote hesitantly, but relaxed once it didn't shock her in kind. She held the remote towards the TV and pressed a button. Suddenly, you felt faint and blacked out almost instantly.

You will soon enter the world of a crappy made-for-tv romantic comedy, but what type of movie have you landed in?

The next thing you knew, your eyes snapped open, and you were sitting down. Looking around, you found that you weren't in your apartment anymore, and Holly was nowhere to be seen. You were on an airplane, staring at the in-flight television built into the seat in front of you. Glancing out the window, the plane was sitting on the ground, but whether it had just landed, or was about to take off, you didn't know.

"What the hell?" you asked yourself, trying not to arouse the suspicions of the two seat occupants to your left.

You looked again at the TV, noticing that it had a listing for an in-flight movie.

"An overworked executive who hasn't spoken to her family in years is forced to return home for the holidays to see her ailing mother, perhaps one last time, and re-encounters an old high-school friend, re-igniting an unrequited crush she never knew existed, while learning the true reason for the season."

"Oh, I get it. Karmic punishment. My hell is to be forced to watch one of these things for eternity in the worst place possible." you sighed, before turning to your row-mates, to see if they heard you.

That's when you realized that nobody was moving at all. The plane was entirely motionless, all those people, passengers, flight attendants were as still as still could be. And then...

They started moving, and the bustle of disembarkation started. You got up and stared at the overhead, wondering where your carry-on was, and how you'd gotten on the plane, when a man handed you a small suitcase and smiled.

"I figured you were waiting for help." he smiled.

"Thanks." you said, taking the suitcase and walking off the plane.

Once you found a bench in the airport, you opened the case up and searched the belongings. You found a cell-phone, a gray peacoat, and some papers regarding business stuff you had no frame of reference for.

"What the hell is going on?" you wondered aloud.

You took the jacket out, and also figured out where you were, Amber Hollows, a small town in Maine, so you put the jacket on and headed out to the luggage carousel, but the matching suitcase never showed up. You found a ticket in your pocket, along with an address in Amber Hollows and told the airport worker to send the luggage there if it's found, and headed out of the airport.

"My best bet is this address. Better head there." you said, using the phone to call a ridesharing app.

As the driver drove, you searched through the phone. Most texts were entirely business-related, and one referred to visiting home, but was very vague. As you wondered what to do, you glanced up at the rearview mirror, then down at yourself, realizing that

"Holy shit!" you exclaimed, jumping back.

"You okay, miss?" the driver asked.

"Miss?" you asked as you touched your face, seeing the woman in the mirror, who looked a lot like a semi-famous actress you couldn't place, do the same thing.

"Looks like we're here. Need help with your bags?" the driver asked.

"Nope. Just this." you hurried out of the car, unsure about how to take the sight you'd just seen.

The car pulled away, leaving you on the sidewalk in front of a snow-covered lawn of a house done up in spectacular Christmas decorations. Heck, even the snow was perfectly settled. No footprints or anything. Too perfect.

"Oh no..." you said.

The image from the plane was starting to make sense. That summary you'd read, it wasn't for a movie you were going to have to watch. You were being forced to live through one.

"This can't be happening." you said. "I won't do it."

Suddenly, you were standing at the front door, which opened, revealing a young woman in a Christmas sweater, who immediately hugged you.

"I gotta admit, I'm surprised you actually came." she said.

"Of course... what's going on?" you asked.

"Mom, same as usual. You'd know that if you kept in touch more. It means a lot to her that you're here for Christmas." she said.

"Molly, who's at the door?" a weak voice asked from another room.

You could figure these plots out in your sleep. That's the sick mom.

"It's me, mom!" This might be an unfamiliar situation, but you weren't an unfeeling monster. If that woman needs her daughter, you'll let her have her.

You were about to step through the threshold when you heard a commotion.

"Jojo! Wait!" you heard an older man's voice shout, followed by the pitter patter of a running dog.

"Woah!" you exclaimed as a Golden retriever lunged at you, knocking you backwards and into the lawn, soaking your jacket through to your clothes. He licked your face until he was pulled away by Molly.

"Sorry about that, buttercup, but you know how excited Jojo can get." an older man, resembling some famous actor who hadn't worked in real cinema lately, said.

That must be the dad. He reached a hand down to help you up.

"Where's the rest of your luggage? You are planning on staying until after Christmas, right?" the dad asked.

"It's a... long story." you said. "Airport lost the rest of my bags, I guess."

"That's no problem." the weak voice said, you looked over to see an older woman carrying an oxygen tank with her. "We've still got whatever clothes she left when she moved out. I'm sure most of it still fits."

"Dear, you shouldn't be walking around." the dad said, rushing over to her.

"She's been waiting all day, go talk to her," Molly said, closing the door.

"You should change, dear. No sense being wet and cold indoors. I'll be in the den when you're ready." the mom said as the dad led her into the other room. "Everything is just how you left it."

You headed upstairs and saw once door conspicuously left closed. You opened it, seeing the bedroom of a college student, left untouched for years. You opened the jacket to find your t-shirt and jeans had become a pantsuit.

But now, he was scared out of his wits, along with Tom and Grant.

"L-Lets get back to the car!" Grant cried out.

"But we didn't have much gas left," Tom reminded him. "Who knows if we'd make it out."

"Didn't that radio lady say something about not trying to leave?" Charlie asked, barely containing his own fear just to keep the group together. "Then again, it might just be a prank...."

"After what we just saw...I don't think we can take that chance.." Tom said, a hand to his head. "This....has to be some kind of nightmare..."

"There.... There's no way...Rick just changed like that...right?" Grant spoke up, almost sounding like he was trying to convince himself more than the others.

Charlie looked back down the street at the bakery. Rick, or rather "Charlotte", didn't seem to be pursuing them. "She" seemed to just be minding her own business, going about the bakery like anyone else would, which looked all the more bizarre with the lack of people.

Seriously, what was up with that? How could a town look so clean yet deserted? The more Charlie thought about it, the more supernatural it felt like. Not having gas or cell service made it feel like they were stranded.

"Okay.....we have to remain calm. Otherwise, we'll get nowhere," Charlie said. "Also, we need to be careful. Rick changed after eating that cupcake, so we might need to be weary of anything we see around."

"So, no food?" groaned Grant. He had gone the longest without eating.

"Afraid so," Charlie confirmed.

At that, the trio began moving as a brisk pace, hoping to find something to get them out of here. It wasn't easy though, as all of them kept getting these weird sensations every now and then, like something was beckoning them.

"It's like there are ghosts everywhere," gulped Tom. "Like something keeps grabbing me."

"Me too," said Charlie.

Charlie looked around and to his surprise actually found a old school landline phone.

“Hey I’ve got a phone!” Charlie called out.

Cautious Charlie used his shirt to pick it up slowly as he heard the dial tone and immediately dialed 911. He heard a ringing on the other end as a sudden automated voice picked.

“Thank you for using the Newtown public service. It seems you are currently an unregistered member of Newtown. Please chose your role and return once you become a valuable member of our amazing town!” The auto voice hung up the line as Charlie looked back to Grant and shook his head.

“How long do you think we can keep this up?” Grant asked.

“I dunno but I’m not giving up yet.” Charlie said trying to keep the hope Alive.

Heading back out Charlie and Grant soon noticed Tom was missing...

“Where the hell did he go?” Grant yelled.

“Damn him...we have to find him.” Charlie said as they back out to the street.

“Look I see a bar.” Grant pointed out. Knowing Tom loves to drink.

“I also see a restaurant, he was really hungry too.” Charlie said.

"Let's check out the bar first," Charlie said.

"Got it," Grant nodded, following his friend as they rushed to the bar.

Running inside as fast as they could, they found a pretty nice looking bar all things considered. Selection seemed super big, lots of games and TV's around, all of which just as empty as the rest of the town. Looked pretty nice actually, kind of like the rest of the town. Amazing how something that looked so nice held such a dark secret, whatever this was.

Thankfully, Charlie's guess turned out to be right, as they saw Tom behind the bar, his back turned to them as he was clearly putting something together.

"What are you doing?!" Charlie cried out, which didn't seem to surprise Tom.

"I'm thirsty, dude," Tom said as if it was natural, turning around with a half-drunk cup in his hand. "Gotta say, this is some pretty good stuff. Better than what I've had in a while. You should try the gin and tonic."

Charlie and Grant's faces paled instantly. What happened to Rick sped through both of their minds, and this seemed very familiar.

"You idiot!" Charlie cried out again. "Did you already forget what happened with Rick?"

"What are the odds of....that....." Tom began saying, suddenly putting the mostly done drink down on the counter. Some how, his stomach just seemed to be acting up. "Ugh...maybe my stomach didn't like that..."

"Graugh!" Charlie groaned loudly. "Did it really drag you in that easily?"

"Sorry....it just seemed really tempting, and I really wanted something..." Tom said, now feeling a little queasy.

Looking over there, there was a picture of a woman. Very much the trophy wife type. Tanned and beautiful with a dynamite figure and big breasts. The whole works really.

Tom's face paled at the sight of that. A woman who looked like she had all the wealth in the world and loved to show it off. It reminded him of how some people perceived him to be and it disgusted him. Even reminded him of some of the girls he dated who were just after his family's money.

"AHHHHH!" Tom cried out, looking at his womanly arms. "No no no!"

"Damn it!" Charlie cried out, not sure what to do. "We gotta stop this somehow!"

"How?!" Grant cried back. "We barely know anything!"

"Well figure it out!" Tom cried back, partially from the emotions he was feeling from the changes. "I don't want to be...this person!"

Tom groaned as he felt his hair suddenly growing out, becoming longer and blonder as it was beginning to stream out from his head, touching his ears and neck as it kept on growing. Furthermore, his clothes were rapidly changing, his legs quickly becoming more shown off as his pants were merging with his shirt, becoming tight against his body as the sleeves and top disappeared to show off his collarbone and allow his hair to fully go over his shoulders.

"Oh god...oh god....oh god...." Tom was getting more emotional, particularly when he began to feel his chest itching. "Charlie...help me.....help me please!"

1523111111.content:
Suffice to say, both boys were scared out of their mind right now. Just like that, both of their friends had fallen victim to this bizarro town, and they were no closer to getting a way out themselves. Stranded in a town that felt like it was out to get them.

"N-Now what?" Grant asked.

"I don't know," Charlie sighed as the two of them kept on walking through the streets. "I just don't know."

Rick becoming Charlotte was one thing, but the look on Tom's face as he suddenly shifted into being Miranda was at the front of both of their minds. It sounded like such a horrible thing to be taken over like that. Tom never would have liked that kind of life, despite it ironically being the kind of perception some people had of him. Whatever was causing these transformations seemed to have a pretty big effect on the mental state of the one being changed.

Well, the only way to avoid it would be to get out obviously, which they were no closer to solving. Every building and kind of business felt like it was tempting in every sense of the word. Charlie could feel it with every step they took, and it was taking all he had to not let his mind wander on any of them. He wasn't sure if Grant was holding up though. The often shy guy wasn't a stranger to being lead around by enticing words.

And it was on that note that Grant stopped him.

"Hey, how about there?" he pointed to a large office building. "Maybe we can find a better phone in there? At least a computer or something would be nice."

"Well...yeah, but how would we know that won't change us?" Charlie asked. "At this point, we have to wary of everything. Not just food."

"Yeah...but wouldn't that basically be doing nothing?" Grant asked.

To be honest, he kind of had a point there. Nothing would get done if they just walked around. It wasn't like they could walk to whatever town was after Newtown on their trip. That would be hours away by car. Sighing, Charlie realized they had to.

"All right, let's go in," he gave in to it, following Grant inside.

The two of them walked inside, finding it as pristine as the other shops they had been in so far. Immediately, they tried going for the nearby receptionist's desks as they had computers. However, try as they might to turn them on, nothing seemed to be working. On the plus side, at least Charlie didn't feel any changes so perhaps they would be alright there.

"Let's try another floor," he suggested, getting a nod.

The two of them continued to go up floor by floor, exploring just about every section they could. However, they kept on getting the same result each and every time. Eventually, they were getting to the last floor. Grant was honestly pretty frazzled by this point.

"Hey, it's okay," Charlie tried to reassure him. "We'll find something...and perhaps it'll all be over soon."

"Maybe...though if we get out, what about Rick and Tom?" he asked.

"Well, perhaps once we get out, we can find something," Charlie suggested. Honestly, he wasn't sure how realistic any of this was, but it was better than nothing.

Eventually, the elevator doors finally opened up to the top floor.

"But, you could be... you both could be wrong." Grant said, his eyes darting about, "Your macho, sexist bullshit sounds like something Rick would've said..." He turned to Charlie, "And you're sexism might make you a girly girl... who loves micro-miniskirts, and taking it up the ass."

Tom raised a calming hand, detecting the fear whirling out of control behind Grant's eyes.

15312.content:
It was your first week in college and you were excited. Both for academic and non-academic reasons.

You had seen the movies and heard the stories about how fun and sexy a time college was. Naturally you didn’t believe it all, but your first week here your jaw dropped at all the attractive women that went to this school.

You shared a dorm with a guy who seemed odd but cool- if not cool, then at least decent. But odd.

Your first night at college, you got invited to a party(you were never invited to parties in high school) and that was really cool.

153122.content:
You got really drunk at the party, you vaguely remember making out with a few women.

One thing you didn’t remember was your dorm-mate being there. You couldn’t determine why you were invited and he wasn’t. Or if he was invited, why he didn’t come. That was only a brief afterthought because your main concern was to have fun.

—-
Of course, there were other parties that occurred throughout your first week, and to your delight you were invited to each and every one of them.

Your second night in college, you had intended to go to the party, but after you finished your classes and returned to your dorm you found yourself surprisingly beat.

“Man, I must’ve overdid myself at that party last night” you say to yourself before you collapse on the bed. You pass out the moment your head hits the pillow.

—-

You’re in a girls dorm and you’re making out on the bed. One thing leads to another, and you get a pretty good idea of where things are going to go next.

The kissing soon stops as she leans up and begins to remove her top. Right as she’s about to pull her top over her breasts.

“Leo!” Your dorm-mate wakes you up, “don’t you have class in ten minutes.

“Oh come on, Paul!” You sleepily yell in frustration and close your eyes trying to return to the dream...before the message Paul conveyed to you slipped in. “Oh shoot! Class! How long have I been asleep?!”

You run to class and just barely make it.

—
You once again finish all your classes for the day, with no further slip ups. During your classes, a girl comes up to you and flirtily says, “I missed you at the party last night.”

“Yeah, I guess I was still exhausted from the first party”

“Are you going to be at the party tonight?”

“If you’ll be there, then so will I” you say, surprising yourself with how smooth that was.

The girl smiles and responds, “I’ll see you there!”

College is great, you think to yourself and smile all the way back to your dorm room.

As soon as you get in, you once again get really tired. “What?! Where did this come from?!” Each second makes you exponentially more sleepy. “I guess a short nap wouldn’t hurt” you wonder to yourself as you collapse onto the bed. Once again, you immediately fall asleep as soon as you land.

—-
Once again, you find yourself making out with the girl on the bed. It was just as joyful as the first dream. Once again, she leans back and is about to remove her top when.

BANG BANG BANG comes from her door.

“LEA?! Are you in there with someone?!” Yells a man from the other side of the door.”

“On no!” Lea quietly screams, “you can’t be here! You need to hide!”

She immediately puts her top back on and climbs off of you. She then grabs your hand and drags you off of the bed and leads you to the second door in her room, “hide in here. I’ll collect you when it’s safe. Just Stay In Here!”

She then opens the door and pushes you in. And you find yourself in a large(and well lit) walk-in closet. Just as you’re calming down, you hear a click from the door. Lea just locked you in this closet.

You look around and notice a few things. One, how does a dorm have a closet this large? Two, how is it that the closet allow for all the dresses to be facing outward instead of at their side? It’s like the hangers of this closet were intended of laying out clothes intending to be worn instead of just being efficiently stored. At the end of the closet was another dress hung on the wall with a few extra light to shine a spotlight on them- as though it were the most special dress.

You expected to be collected soon. But it felt like hours had passed since you were locked into this woman’s closet. No matter where you looked there were articles her clothes. Trying to look at the floor revealed open shelves of dressers revealing undergarments. The ceiling held racks of jewelry. Everywhere you looked there was more articles of feminine attire.

“Hello Leo”
