Without giving you a chance to respond, Natalie grabs your hand and pulls you along towards the shuttle. You didn’t even have a chance to grab your coffee.

—you both make it onto the shuttle and sit together in the back of the vehicle.

“Now,” Natalie explains, “we’re going to Elsterbrook Way. We can’t miss it, it’s the last spot on their route and they wait five minutes before circling back around.”

Natalie then yawns again and then lowers her head.

You felt awkward sitting there while she took a nap but you’ve come this far and she really seemed to want to see you. You figured you’d just let her get her rest in, she said she needed coffee after all.

—-

After 10 minutes on the shuttle the driver yells “Elsterbrook Way! Last stop before we turn back!”

You expected Natalie to wake up at the sound of her stop, but she was still out cold. You gave her a light nudge, and then shook her shoulder a little bit. “Natalie...we’re here”

When she opened her eyes, she looked almost startled to see you, before her expression shifted to a look of confusion, and then recollection.

“Oh!” She exclaimed- reality settling in. She shot up and you followed her off the shuttle.

“Sorry about that, I was just having the craziest dream”

“Yeah, I’ve been having a bit of that myself,” you confess, “What was your dream about?”

“You first!” She demands

“Oh...ugh...no... I don’t tell people my dreams” you cover.

“Me neither,” she said with a tone of relief.
15312212123311121111.title: On your way there, you bump into someone

153122121233111211111.content:
Natalie makes good on her word.

As soon you two step in, she immediately brews a large pot of coffee. You two sit on the couch and drink it.

“You were right!” You declare, “this coffee is MUCH better than the cafe!”

“Isn’t it?!” She agrees enthusiastically.

“I could drink this nonstop! It’s SO GOOD!”

“Right! You’d just never sleep again!”

“Ha! That’s a sacrifice I’d be willing to make.” You say, reflecting on the “sleeping” you had been doing the last few nights.

You see Natalies shoulders twitch.

“What was that?” You asked, “nervous tick?”

“No, that’s just the caffeine kick. That’s how you know it’s working.”

You fake a small spasm in your shoulders as well

“See?! It must be working!” Natalie plays along. She then hops off the couch and starts talking about the books on her bookshelf. Listing off her favorite books one by one...

“...and that’s why she’s my favorite character of any book ever. She just seemed so sexy, but also rebellious and dignified all at the same time!”

“I’ll have to read it,” you nod along.

“In fact, she’s a big inspiration for my own personal sense of style. Whenever I buy clothes a part of my mind would think “is this something Samantha would wear?”

“Really?!” You feign interest.

“Really!” She confirms, “like, here, let me show you.”

You got really excited seeing her disappear into her bedroom.

“Looks like I’m getting a fashion show,” you think to yourself.

About a second later, Natalie returns to the living room wearing the same thing she had on, but with a handful of clothes in her arms.

She returned to the spot on the couch next to you and laid the clothes out across the coffee table. She then took each article of clothing and explained how it reminded her of Samantha.

An odd thing she would do with each blouse, skirt, dress, bra, and panties is that- while, at first, she would hold it out to the side so that both of you could see it, she would orbit the article in front of her while she was facing you. Almost as though she was aligning it with you. Though, she was probably just really emotionally invested in the clothes.

She made it about half way through the pile when she said, “oh no! I’m boring you aren’t I?”

You tried to ease her worries, “no, it’s fine. Really.”

“Oh no! I’m boring you, I know it.” She continued, “here I told you to abandon your lectures, only to come here and lecture you about these clothes!”

“It’s fine! Don’t worry.”

“No it’s not!” She sternly said, “let me put these up and we’ll do something fun, I swear!”

She gathered up all the clothes back into her arms and slid past you on the couch, knocking down your backpack in the process.

On the collision with the ground, the contents of the backpack spilled out onto the floor.

“I’ll get that!” She said

“No, it’s fine! I can get it”

“No! I knocked it over, I can clean it up. You stay right there!”

She was really assertive about it, so you guiltily let her and you took another sip of your coffee.

A moment later she placed the backpack back on the couch. You noticed it looked a bit more full than before.

“That’s odd.” You pondered, “hey, where did those clothes you have go? You couldn’t have put them up already...”

“What clothes?” She asked.

You unzipped the backpack to, sure enough, reveal all the clothes she showed you- overflowing out of the opening.

She stared slack jawed at the backpack. “Why did I do that?”

“It was probably an accident?” You asked.

“How did I do that?” She asked her self. You began to worry hearing someone else ask these same questions that you had been asking the previous few days.

“Natalie...what was that dream that you had? ...on the shuttle?”

She looked at you concerned and did and scanned your body with her eyes.

“What was it, Natalie? What did you dream?”

Instead of answering you she leapt towards you and started kissing you dragging you by your shirt into her bedroom.

“Natalie, what are you doing?”

“Just let it happen.” She said, ripping off her blouse and then continuing to pull you deeper into her bedroom.

“Let what happen?”

She began unbuckling your pants.

“Natalie, I’ve got a bad feeling about this.”

She tore your pants down around your ankles along with what was under them and began working at your shirt.

“That’s what makes this so exciting, Lea!” She said, finishing pulling off your shirt.

“What did you just call me?”

At this point, she stopped, “I just called you Lea, didn’t I?” She looked startled again.

“What has gotten over me?” She sounded startled while continuing to undress and tossing her clothes right next to where your clothes laid.

“Natalie...I need to tell you what you dreamt.”
153122121233111211111.title: At Natalie’s Apartment

1531221212331112111111.content:
“I don’t want to say” she says looking away from you and then she looks as though she had an epiphany.

“You know don’t you?” She asks you, a smile curving on her face.

“Know what?” You ask, feeling uneasy by her smile.

“You’ve been having the same dreams.”

“I...” you begin trying to steer her off.

“With the talking clothes.”

“What do they mean?!” You plead.

“So you HAVE been having them!” He eyes grow wide, “the ones where they’re begging you to join them. Dying for you them to join them.”

A memory from the dreams briefly fly before your eyes- being pulling into that closet. You snap out of it to find yourself holding a bra in your hands with the straps around your forearms.

“Ah!” You scream and drop it to the floor and look over at Natalie, her eyes wide with excitement.

“So it IS true!” She declares joyfully, “it means something!”

“What was it? What did you dream?”

“One of my skirts was lying on the floor. I went to pick it up. And in my hands it said, ‘we need you to help us’” she said as she began walking towards you, “then it flew out of my hands and floated over to my bedroom- I followed it.” She got closer, “It then directed me to my closet door. I opened it, and there you were all dressed up looking like the most beautiful woman I had ever seen.” She was standing right in front of you, “and...I knew it was right. The skirt reminded me to help them.”
She kissed your lips, “I said ‘yes’”

“It was just a dream,” you pleaded, “you don’t have to help them. You could help me instead. Together we could figure this out. Return things back to normal.”

“After what I saw in that dream,” she said taking a couple steps away from you before turning back to face you, “I don’t want things to go back to normal.”

“When I opened the door,” she continued, “the clothes were whispering something into your ear...what were they saying?”

“I didn’t dream that,” you began before unknowingly reciting the words to a recollected dream you didn’t have: “be a good girl, be a good, good girl” you repeated the lines as they were repeated to you as you remembered wrestling against them trying to get out, but the animated dress kept you contained amongst the wardrobe.

You eventually snapped out of it, “I didn’t dream that!” You yelled, “how do I remember a dream that I didn’t have?” Noticing that your hands were now full of even more of Natalies clothes.

“Because the dream is more than either me or you” she said, while giving you a shove into her closet and closing the doors.
1531221212331112111111.title: Natalie tells you her drea

15312212123311121111111.content:
When the closet doors closed you were hit with a feeling of reluctant ambivalence. Once again, you were stuck in a woman’s closet- except this time it wasn’t a dream.

From the closet doors you saw a light painted on the door shining from behind you.

“I guess I should check it out” was the thought that cake to your head, but you weren’t certain that you thought it.

Regardless, you turned around and approached it- as though you were following orders.

Walking down this long corridor, “a bit odd for a college girls closet, no?”, you heard whispers from around you “you’re our good girl”. A few steps in and you felt something sliding up your legs, you looked down to see a pair of panties equipping themselves on you.

“I don’t want this,” you thought, but for some reason you couldn’t find the energy to fight them.

The further down you walked, more articles equipped themselves onto you incrementally- until you were fully dress-ed when you arrived at the source of the light. A vanity mirror reflecting the spitting image of yourself in a dream.

“I should sit down,” came to your mind, “I didn’t think that. I wouldn’t think that. And I don’t want to be dressed like this.”

Still, you sat down before the vanity mirror.

“I should touch up my face,” came to your mind.

“What? No! Why? Where are these thoughts coming from?”

And yet, you then began commanding your hands to apply various cosmetics on your face.

Once you were finished the haze that you had been in lifted and you stared in shock at the person looking back at you from the mirror- and it certainly wasn’t a Leo.
—

The doors of the closet opened and you felt as though you had spaced out for a moment, you looked around to see a standard closet no corridor, no vanity mirror just a small, cramped closet.

“Perfect,” Natalie smiled, which resulted in you looking yourself over to see that you had somehow completely dressed yourself in Natalies clothes.

You stormed out of the closet and looked in the mirror to see your made up face.

“What is happening to me?!” You screamed.
15312212123311121111111.title: Inside the closet

choices: Try to get your backpack back
153122121233111211111112.content:
“This isn’t right,” you yelled while looking up and down Natalies room for the outfit you arrived in, “where ARE they?”

“Where are what?” Natalie asked.

“My clothes! The clothes I was wearing when I came here.”

“I ripped them to shreads and threw them out the window!”

“You what?!”

“Don’t you see?! This is right! This is how you need to be, Lea!”

“I’M NOT LEA! I’m Leo! I’m a man!”

Natalie kissed you and said, “Just stop fighting it, Lea”

You grabbed your backpack and stormed out of Natalie’s apartment. You had to remove yourself from this insanity

You had a good distance to run before you could get back to your dorm. The quickest route was through the girls dorm story block. As you ran, you passed many girls, all of them staring at you slackjawed upon seeing you. You avoided eye contact and hoped that they didn’t/wouldn’t recognize you.

—-
After many awkward encounters you finally arrived at your dorm.

“I should put up the clothes in my backpack” came into you head, it seemed like a reasonable idea at first. You then remembered that it was all Natalies clothes in your backpack.

“No! Why did I even bring this back with me?!” You yelled.

Before changing you decided to make a symbolic action of running down the hall and throwing your backpack and all the clothes in it down the garbage chute.

“There,” you said and walked back to your dorm.

You immediately opened your closet to look for clothes to change into only to see that half of your wardrobe had been replaced with Natalies clothes. You must have spaced out again and switched out the clothes in your backpack with Natalies clothes.

That “symbolic action” of yours, the clothes in that backpack you threw out- were your own...
153122121233111211111112.title: You stealth to your dorm

choices: “What are you doing? Shouldn’t you be heading to class?”
You decide to film yourself while you change to see what’s going on
1531221212331112112.content:
Now that you had nothing you had to focus on, another vision of those dreams that you were having slipped into your attention.

The memory of being pulled out of your clothes, shoved into that dress and then dragged into that closet consumed you for a moment. What could it all mean? Why were you having these recurring dreams? Where did they come from? What caused them?

After a moment you were able to snap out of it only to look in the mirror and see that you were back in the blouse and dress you had just changed out of.
1531221212331112112.title: The damn breaks

1532.content:
How does this new spirit come to inhabit you?

Hypnosis?(this is basically the pt 2 of Hypno-Sis once the hypnosis has been removed)

A ghost?

Something else?
1532.title: New Hand at the Wheel

15321.content: Do you want to establish the initial hypnosis of Aaron?
15321.title: Optional prelude

choices: You wander through the store awkwardly
153222.content:
You’re at a Victoria’s Secret getting your girlfriend a pair of fancy underwear for her birthday per her request.

“Are you sure you wouldn’t want something else? Concert tickets? Jewelry? Do you really want me to go to that store to get you underwear?”

You reflect on the conversation you had.

“I thought men loved going to that store.”

“Not me, it makes me uncomfortable being in there.”

“Pick me up something that strikes your eye and it’ll be worth your while.”

The conversation ended. “Maybe I can just get her some perfume or something and get out of here.” You ponder, but realize that she wouldn’t be happy with that gift. “Maybe a gift certificate and she can pick something out herself.” But gift certificates seem a bit hokey.

“Just get in and get out” you say to yourself.
153222.title: A model

1533.content:
Hectic Hypnosis: by one method or another, you’ve been hypnotized into femininity.


Testing Poorly: your college has a special test at the start of your freshman year that determines everything: your major, your extracurriculars, even your friends. What happens when our protagonist’s test comes back female?
1533.title: Something else

15332.content:
John Harper was excited to start college! He hadn’t got into an Ivy like he’d hoped but instead would be at Texas Grand University. TGU is one of the top private schools on the market and was famous for 2 things: tuition was always free and they guaranteed a job coming out of school.

John arrived on his first day, looking for a dorm when he was told to report to Michael T. Franklin building for his initiation test.

“This will determine your future here at TGU” the man standing at the campus’ main entrance said.

Excitedly, John rushed to Franklin and found a massive nest of computer terminals. Excitedly he sat down. The computer asked for his finger print and proof of ID. Upon providing it, the test began. It was a 90 question blitz of trivia, personal beliefs and math John fought through and he eventually finished it all.

The computer went black before flashing

RESULTS AS FOLLOWS...
15332.title: Testing Poorly

choices: John makes it to her... his room
The female attendant offers to help him
John wakes up for classes the next morning
153321.content:
RESULTS AS FOLLOWS

JOHN HARPER

MAJOR: FASHION

EXTRACURRICULARS: CHEERLEADING, PHOTOGRAPHY, FRENCH CLUB

DORM: FRESHMAN BUILDING C, FEMALE FLOOR 4

CLASSES: PHOTOGRAPHY 101, FASHION 125, FRENCH 1, ATHLETICS-CHEER 1

MEAL PLAN: HEALTH FOOD ONLY

WARDROBE WILL BE WAITING FOR YOU


John was confused. Was this saying what he thought it was saying? John was a classic guy’s guy. He didn’t care about fashion, much less cheerleading. And what did they mean by that female floor and wardrobe?

He leaned back in his seat and called over an attendant. The young lady smiled and walked over, she leaned in to read the computer and was just as taken aback as John.

“I’m sorry,” she said. “I need to call my supervisor. This is above my pay grade.”

A few minutes later a middle-aged man came walking through the computer area and found John and the attendant.

“My name is Michael Jenkins. I supervise the freshman tests for the revolutionary education system we use here at TGU. What seems to be the problem?”

John motioned over to the results. Michael took a long look before turning back to John.
“I don’t know what’s wrong. It seemed to register you as female not male. Try taking the test again.”

John restarted the computer, and it asked again for his fingerprint.

STUDENT ALREADY REGISTERED: MS JOHN HARPER

“Well this is odd,” said Michael, “it appears you are locked into this system as female.”

“Is there anyway to change it?” Begged John.

“Not that I know of. We can appeal to the creator of the system but that could take weeks. I’d recommend you get to your new dorm, John. You can use your thumb to enter the correct buildings for now.
153321.title: Cheerleader/Fashion Major

15333.content: Resort Adventure: You, a runaway orphan and an amateur thief aged 18, tried to sneak into a luxurious resort that doubles as a residential area for the rich and luxurious. However, you get more than what you’ve bargained for.
15333.title: More Options

153331.content:
Your name is Jesse Turner. Ever since you were a baby you lived at an orphanage in the state of California. When you were fourteen, you ran away to try to make your way into this world. You were never the biggest or strongest kid, always relying on your smarts to live to see another day. You’ve dabbled in petty theft.

Now, you wanted to aim big. Rashly, you decided to sneak in the world-famous Galaxy Resort and steal some very valuable items and trinkets. The Galaxy Resort was known to not only be, well, a resort, it was famous for also be a living area for some of the richest people in the USA and the world. You figured that some of them have to slip up and leave their precious belongings ready to be stolen.

Firstly, do you sneak in at through the ventilation system or some other way?
153331.title: Resort Adventure

1533311.content:
Crawling through the vents, you thanked your lucky stars that you were a rather skinny guy. It seemed as if the vent was becoming smaller and smaller by the minute.

Eventually, you couldn’t quite move anywhere, being stuck in a particular spot. As if to tempt you, there was a vent cover right in front of you with, from what you could see, no one behind it.

For some reason, you were struck with the idea of moving back a bit, remove your “thief costume” and then try to squeeze through to get to the vent cover. Alternatively, you could just find another way in.
1533311.title: Ventilation system

154.content:
On the Run:

When an evil corporation tricks an unsuspecting employee into signing away the rights to his body, they inject him with a serum to change his entire body into that if a sexy and beautiful female but one that is obedient and submissive to become the perfect trophy wife to their powerful and rich client. However the process is interrupted and now our main character is on the run dealing with a changing body trying his best to avoid capture.
154.title: Something else

choices: You are suddenly called up the main head office
A mysterious email arrives on your computer
1541.content:
“You got all that?” A dark and mysterious voice said over the phone to a corporate employee on the other line.

“Yes sir, you want her to be Asian, with flawless skin, long silky black hair. Large perfectly rounded breasts around DD cup in size. You want her to have long shapely legs and perfect hourglass body, a perfect tear drop butt. Lastly you want her to be submissive and obedient, to only want to dress sexy and please you.” The employee said.

“Yes...I expect a flawless creation. Use whatever means necessary.” The mysterious voice said on the other end before hanging up.

——3 Months Later——

You are Vince Mars, 22, fresh out of college and working as an intern at GeneXCorp. They are one of worlds largest pharmaceutical companies and a leader in new perception drugs that have changed the world.

You lucked your way into this job by sheer luck and chance when you were selected from a random pool of potential candidates. Right now you are mostly just in the mail room and getting coffee for people but the potential for growth here is extraordinary.

You don’t really have a family to speak of. Your mom passed away a couple years ago and your dad was never in the picture. The only person who had always had your back is your best and only real friend Julian.

You have been here at GeneXCorp for 6 months now and you are fairly happy. Currently single and living alone but doing your best to make it by every day.

——Upstairs in the higher ups office——

“Him?” An executive asked as he looked at a picture of a young man. Being shown to him by a female doctor in a white lab coat.

“Yes sir, he’s perfect. Vince Mars, no Immediate family and his gene code is a perfect match for the serum. When he vanishes nobody will look twice.” She said.

“Alright make it happen. Bring up and tell him we are promoting him to an executive position or whatever. Get him to sign the waiver and then get him into the lab for the serum injection, tell him it’s a simple vaccine to boost his immune system or something. Our client is growing impatient we are already behind schedule on delivery.” The executive said as the doctor acknowledged this and left his office.
1541.title: Sounds good

15413.content:
The female doctor, Rachel Thomas, left the office to go find you, not all too pleased at being forced to rush this. She thought about how this whole thing began, with Mr. Takahashi and GeneXCorp discussing a significant business move. Mr. Takahashi had been associated with the company for some time, but this was the first time he was making this much a contribution. As one would expect of course, the request didn't come cheap, but it was something the top brass at GeneX were more than willing to accept.

Rachel was one of the top scientists involved with what they did, and this particular matter wasn't too unfamiliar to her, even if it required some special work. What they were going to make was going to take a little bit of time, but apparently the top brass weren't too patient, trying to push things along faster. At the very least, she made sure it all happened smoothly.

And frankly, she had her eyes on you from the very start. She always kept an eye on any potential people that could work for the products they made and you were no exception. Once the specific request three months ago came in, she had you pegged from the start. Fresh out of college with little work experience and no one who would immediately notice a disappearance. It was all too perfect. All the while, she formulated what her excuse would be for you to not notice anything odd about signing a waiver or getting a shot, and she had just the right idea.

In the Mail Room

You wiped your forehead a bit as you kept on working. For a mail room, they got quite a bit of stuff to organize. Guess it made sense for a company in which many things were coming and going. Well at least lunch was soon so you had that to look forward to. However, as you were going along, you heard a little knock.

"Vince Mars," you heard a female voice, turning to see a woman in a lab coat right by the door.

"Yes ma'am?" you asked nicely. "What can I do for you?"

"No need to be all serious," Rachel smiled, bringing him a little closer. "I just came by to tell you that we need you for something. Particularly with your registration here."

"What do you mean?" you asked out of confusion.

"Our database is getting updated soon, so we'll need some information for your employee profile. I just need you to come with me to get some things done and then you can get back to your work." she said.

Seeing nothing wrong with that, you agreed to her offer. Hey if it was the law, what could you say really.

"Great. Now, just to get this out of the way, how about you go and sign this now," she suggested, putting down a waiver sheet on the table where you were sitting. "Nothing unusual. No different than signing your name when doing an application."

You looked over it briefly, seeing nothing with it at all, not that you really knew all that better to be fully honest. Something was mentioned about some lab work necessary, but nothing too unusual from what you could tell. With that in mind, you signed it.

"All right....there you go," you said as you gave it back to Rachel.

"Perfect," she smiled. "Now, if you'll come along with me to the lab, we can get that out of the way too."

"Is it just for blood work or something?" you asked as you got up to follow her.

"Something like that. It's basically something all our employees are getting. Pharmaceuticals are no joke you understand," Rachel replied.

That made sense to you. You kind of figured something like that would be the case with such a company. With that in mind, you began following Rachel through the building. You honestly hadn't seen much of their lab before to be honest, so this would be quite a treat in addition.

"Wow...." you said when coming out of the elevator. "This is huge."

"It has to for everything we work on," Rachel said, taking a slightly roundabout route as to make sure you didn't see anything all that unusual.

Eventually, you ended up in another room, and were offered a seat. You sat there as Rachel went through all the usual precautions, reading your left arm as you often used that when getting any shots.

"Shouldn't feel any different from a normal shot. I'm sure you can handle it," Rachel smirked a little, making you grin amusingly. Yeah yeah very funny.

Honestly, something felt kind of weird about this lab, but you shrugged it off, thinking it was just your imagination. Rachel seemed to be a very well certified doctor so there didn't seem anything to be worried about. Against your notice, Rachel slipped the serum inside, ready to go.

"Okay, here we go," she said, partially to herself.

Leading your arm out a bit, you watched as she injected you, making you tense slightly. Yep, definitely like a shot, and kind of tingly as well....and taking a while....

"Just a little longer..." Rachel said.

You shut up after that, letting her do her work. After what seemed like a while, she finally pulled the needle back, allowing you to relax finally.

"Phew....that took a while," you said.
15413.title: Something else

154131.content:
After the shot you sat there rubbing your arm as your whole body began to feel strange. It was a really weird tingling sensation that was spreading all over your body.

“This doesn’t feel right...” You said to yourself wondering what was going on.

Rachel had stepped out for a moment leaving you alone in the lab room.

You were curious as to why your body was feeling so strangely when a suddenly you were hit with a sudden wave of discomfort and pain. It felt like your body and insides were in knots and twisting all around.

Clutching your sides you began to cry out as you were about to call for help when you felt a pulsing sensation in your hands.

Looking at your hands you saw they were beginning to change. They were popping and shifting around as your eyes went wide.

Your normal fairly average pink skin tone was shifting on your hands as the skin color was shifting becoming paler and more of a porcelain white creamy color. The kind found on many Asian models.

Your hands were also shrinking becoming dainty and very feminine looking at your fingernails grew longer into well manicured nails. After a few minutes a pair of very feminine hands were now attached to your wrists.

You wanted to scream but your shock wouldn’t allow it. You immediately jumped up and opened the room to go find Rachel and ask her what was going on.

To your surprise the lab was empty when you stepped out. There was nobody around....anywhere...

“This can’t be good.” You said worried as you heard a muffled noise coming around the corner down another hallway.

Peaking around the corner you saw Rachel on the phone have a rather suspicious conversation.

“Yes sir...stage one is complete. The subject is injected and the serum is taking effect. Within a few short minutes he will be fully transformed into the Asian profile you sent us. Once that is done we will take her to processing and wipe her memories and speed up the mental changes so she had no knowledge of her former life and will be ready for transportation to become your new bride....Yes sir...I understand. Don’t worry he is a nobody, no one will care that he is gone. Your new wife will be exactly like you asked.” Rachel said as she heard something around the corner.

Little did she know you had already bolted...You had heard enough. This was no accident this was a set up! They played like a flute and were planning on turning you into some rich dudes trophy wife! Whatever mad science was at play here at to be exposed!

When Rachel returned to your room she was shocked to discover you weren’t there....

“Oh no...There must have been a delayed release on the serum...” Rachel said.

She was expecting you to be incapacitated from the serum and helpless but it seemed you had a resistance to the serum which was slowing the changes down from a few minutes to a few hours...

—-Back in the elevator—-

You were panting as you were in the elevator rushing down to the bottom level. You barely managed to get out before you were discovered as you had to get out of here and find help. However where would you go? Who would believe you?

When the elevator reached the bottom level you were in the parking garage looking for your car. You could hear footsteps getting louder as security guards were being dispatched to find you. As you spotted your car you began to run.

However as you ran your felt a familiar pain return this time focused on your feet. You couldn’t see it but your feet were shrinking as you stepped right out of your shoes and socks not stopping to look as you jumped in your car and sped off right before the guards were about to circle you...

You quickly drove away breaking about every traffic law there was as you were now barefoot trying to figure out where to go next...
154131.title: The serum takes effect

1541311.content:
Rachel just heard the news that you had escaped, driving away from the building. Some discomfort was visible on her face, though surprisingly not much panic. True, this probably wouldn't make Mr. Takahashi happy in the slightest, but the die had been cast anyway. Even if you had some kind of lucky resistance to the serum, all it would do is just delay things a little longer. Everything would take hold eventually.

Still, it would make things much better to just get you back now.

Meanwhile

Somehow you didn't have the police tailing you. Guess you were lucky in that aspect too. Driving barefoot wasn't exactly easy but the adrenaline was pushing you forward anyway. You tried to think of somewhere to go, and admittedly that Rachel person stuck a bit of a nerve when saying no one else would miss you. I mean, it was true that you didn't have any family that was particularly close....

But that didn't mean you had nobody, and the one and only person you could trust with this just so happened to be home at this time of day. Perfect! Julian didn't live too far from where your own apartment was, so you could commute there rather easily. Thanks to his usual work hours, he would be home at this time.

The problem with this display is that Lisa has always had short dark brown hair. She barely kept it past her ears before...

“They diagnosed me a week ago and I stayed away trying to fight it and avoid infecting you...I...I’m sorry I just couldn’t stay away anymore the final changes....They’re coming and I’m scared...can you stay with me?” She asked pleading with tears in her eyes.

Jeff was conflicted....He didn’t want a bimbo this close to him...But his feelings for Lisa couldn’t be ignored.

“Oh god I’m horny I can’t feel it coming!” Lisa called out.

Jeff heard a ripping noise as he saw the thin gloves Lisa was wearing were tearing at the tips at bright pink long nails were growing from her fingers.

Lisa took off her coat revealing she was just wearing a sports bra and tight yoga pants with no underwear beneath. She started wearing heels because it felt better nowadays as she was panting and moaning. Small giggles started to come from her mouth.

“Like...it’s...it’s happening!” Lisa cried out.

Her body was rippling as her flesh was starting to shift her small B cups were throbbing as her small ass was shifting along with her other assets as the changes were ready to burst forth any second....
15523.title: Jeff's front doorbell rang.

choices: She introduces Jeff to her adjustment advisor, who was in the kitchen.
"Yeah... hot, huh?" she muttered, as she let Jeff squeeze past her.
"No... It wasn't a double infection." Marcy said with a giggle.
Breaking the ice entirely, she gave him a long hug. "I needed that."
1553.content:
It was Mark's first day home, after he'd been... or rather after she'd been discharged from hospital as no longer infectious. Jeff was curious to see what Mark looked like now, and what new name she'd chosen for herself.

He wanted to stand by one of his oldest friends, all too aware of the stigma that came with this disease. Some chose to use the roving clouds of infection as an opportunity. Craving the chance to experience the feminine side of life. Others dreaded it, as the most humiliating form of contagion.

It's double damage on infected men, and the impact it had on born women, meant that some argued that simply being a woman, was a lowering of status. With bimbodom following as a natural consequence. There was a strong swing towards rejecting infected men, as not real women, and a political will to back them up.

One political fire-brand, had disappeared rather suddenly from the limelight. Only to be discovered by the press after a few months. She'd apparently worried so much about discovery she been careless, and infected a second time. At least, she no longer cared about her sex, or any political opinions. Barbi Braithwaite was a happy bimbo, and oblivious to her own history.

Ironically, some viewed that as a conspiracy to silence a political view. But Barbi, formerly William, or Billy to his friends had many followers eager to spout the same views, and call for the isolation of bimbos, and the increased tax burden they caused.

- - - - -

Knowing he shouldn't he still hoped that Mark had turned into an attractive woman... Just for Mark's sake...

Heart in his throat, he walked up to his friends front door. His finger shook before he pressed the door-bell.

The woman who opened the door to him was breath-taking.

"Mark...." he asked uncertainly.

"Hi, Jeff." She answered with a broad smile, "Though, I go by Marcy nowadays."

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/88/45/80/...

A stray gust of wind reminding Marcy that she wasn't dressed for public showing. Jeff had to rip his gaze from her firm, full bust. Eyes returning to Marcy's face, it was him who was blushing.

Marcy shrugged, "... I get that a lot now." she said, "It's still unnerving, how obvious men are..." her voice tailing off, before, "Come in, Come in..." she beckoned him inside.
1553.title: Jeff went to see a friend recovering from the flu.

choices: Jack tries for a quick cat nap.
Heading downstairs to the bar, Jack wanted another cool drink...
Jack took a shower, to refresh himself.
The empty glass fell from Jack's hand as he succumbed to the heat.
1555.content:
The heat was oppressive, but the views were spectacular. He'd sweated what felt like his weight every day of the trip. But it was undeniably a beautiful country. The people were polite, even if he couldn't understand them. Nor they him. But as his journey was reaching the last day, he returned to his hotel room.

Throwing the balcony windows open wide, the still air refused to circulate. Even the ceiling fan might as well have been stationary. Lying back on the bed (atop the sheets, naturally) he closed his eyes for a moment.

The pull of the glass of icy water drew him back from actually sleeping, and he downed the entire tall glass in a few swift gulps. Looking out the window, the clouds suggested rain. Jack turned back to the TV, and flicked through the channels.

He didn't understand most of what was being broadcast, but eventually settled on a dubbed episode of Star Trek, the original English was still there, in a vague whisper beneath the Vietnamese actors' voices.

Sniffling, Jack blew his nose. He didn't want to stuffed up in this climate. The trip through the red-light district was enlightening, but naturally he didn't indulge in any of the offered services. It was a mix of depressing, the poverty and desperation. But, oddly countered by the general cuteness of what was being offered.

At 6' 2", Jack was taller than average, but here. He was a Giant! A figure visible through any crowd. It was an effort not to stop his way through the crowds... Feeling like Godzilla. He knew that was Japanese, rather than Vietnamese, but it still felt tempting, around all these petite people.

He stabbed the button on the remote, finding concentrating on the programme, just too much effort. It wasn't one of the best episodes either, and he knew the ending.
1555.title: Jack was enjoying Vietnam.

choices: Jack closed his eyes, and the world vanished.
Kimiko helped him prop his head up.
Kimiko's cries for assistance accompanied Jack into the dark...
15552.content:
The bar was fairly empty when Jack went downstairs. The hotel bar was cool and nearby, which satisfied his requirements for the moment. The room feeling a little claustrophobic, he wanted to be around other people, even if he wasn't feeling terribly chatty.

Besides, the bar tender was easy on the eye.

https://i.pinimg.com/564x/63/6c/d0/636cd...

Far from the bustiest woman he knew, but for this country and diet, she was very pleasing. Her english was stilted and laced with childish expressions. Having served as an au-pair and nanny before she returned home to tend to her family.

Jack was knocking back his second beer, when the dizziness hit him hard. Shifting on his bar stool, he felt disconnected from his body. Adjusting, and over-compensating for his shifting balance. He half slipped from the stool. But managed to get his feet beneath him. Rising unsteadily like Bambi, he gave a soothing smile to Kimiko, and gestured to a nearby arm-chair, and gestured with two fingers for a couple more beers.

The chair was well padded and inviting. More falling into it's leathery embrace rather than a controlled descent. Jack figured the heat was making him more vulnerable to the alcohol. A snigger spilled from his lips, at the idea of the tiny people lifting him back to his room like some drunken Gulliver.

Thankfully, he'd placed his beer on the table beside the chair before slumping into it.

Kimiko elegantly approached with two beers resting on a plate. Concern still on her face. Jack wasn't creating a reassuring image for her.

Gesturing for her to put the beers beside the still half-full glass. He gave her a smile, but his hand crashed awkwardly against the ornate carved edge of the table. Setting the beer sloshing heavily in the glass. Jack had to admit he looked drunk... and felt it too.

But there was something else... too.

Turning his head to look up to Kimiko's porcelain face. Again another snigger spilled from his lips. He so rarely had to look up to these petite people. Jack's head had other plans, as his neck continued to tilt backwards, until he was looking at the ceiling. His head atop a rubber neck..
15552.title: Jack headed downstairs to the bar.

choices: "You no longer infectious..." she says with a beaming smile.
"You overstay, you have a big bill." Kimiko said sadly.
"My passport." Jack wailed, "I can't use it, not like this..."
Kimiko spoonfed Jack until his strength returned.
155521.content:
Jack woke with a groan. His throat sore, his breath rasping in and out, what felt like an incredible weight on his chest, and his eyes crusty. He knew he'd been out for a while. His whole body ached, even raising his arms to wipe away the grime that was stopping him from opening his eyes was an effort.... The first attempt, just bending his elbows to reach his face left his arms falling limply back to the bed.

"I've not been this drunk, in a while..." he rasped to himself. His voice scratchy, and weak.

"You're not drunk..." A voice told him in awkward, accented English. "You weren't drunk."

He flinched, as something touched his face, his eyes, the voice giving him no warning, but as water leaked he recognised it as a piece of sponge. Finally, with a couple of gentle swipes the dirt was cleaned from his eyes.

Looking up, Jack saw the ceiling of his hotel room. Raising his head from the pillow was too difficult, as his neck strained. It felt as if only his hair shifted, at the microscopic lift he achieved. With a frustrated groan, his head sank back down. His entire body felt drained, ruined, exhausted.

"It wasn't the alcohol." The voice assured him. "It was femme flu.".

Through his sluggish state, he finally recognised Kimiko's voice.

The last words didn't sink in, as Jack opened his eyes eager to see the pleasing host in his room.

However, the sight was rather less settling, as Jack woke to see the weight pressing down was his... well, her breasts. She was pinned in place, by the sheer weight of them.

Arms flailing wildly at her side, brushed against a withered body. A body which was almost entirely tits... Jack freaked out.

"I'm... I'm a woman." she wailed to Kimiko.

The view through her cleavage was answer enough.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/99/68/89/...

Someone having dressed her in underwear while she was out of her mind.

Adrenaline surged through her veins, as the words 'femme flu' finally penetrated.

Hands coming up, confirmed she truly was a woman. As they sank into her supple breasts. A gasp spilling from her lips at how sensitive they were, at how much she flushed from that simple touch.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/bd/b2/2d/...

"I'm a woman..." Jack's voice trembled.

"You're a beautiful woman." Kimiko assured her.

"I don't want to be a woman..." she wailed, "And why.. why am I so big?"

She rolled to her side, unwilling to look at Kimiko's smiling face.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/ec/92/e1/...

"You were a big man..." Kimiko answering the question, you really didn't want answered, about the body you really didn't want.

"So you become a big girl... that height, that weight..." she struggled to find the right words. "It goes..." she blushed, and mimed having a larger bust.

Jack levered one immense breast aside. She needed a clearer view of Kimiko.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/8c/00/a4/...

"You not tall now... You skinny, and petite..." Her eyes darting to your bust she stops.

"You sleep for a long time."

The adrenalin ebbed from his system, Jack collapsed back flat.
155521.title: Jack closed his eyes, and the world vanished.

choices: Kimiko smiles and nods, "Yes... did you know him?"
You find all your possession have been destroyed to prevent contamination.
You and Kimiko are discharged from the half-way house...
You have more questions about your own transformation.
1555211.content:
The relief on Kimiko's face is clear, "But I'm ... already..." falling back into silence you gesture to your body.

"I'm glad." Kimiko adds with an edge of a pout on her face. "We can leave confinement soon."

"Confinement?" you ask. Taking a second look around the room, you realise it's different than your hotel room. That same spartan interchangeable look, but it's a little simpler than the hotel.

"So..."

"So when you fainted, and the changes started." Kimiko explains, "You were rushed here, and those in close proximity." She holds a hand to her chest.

"I'm glad I didn't become a bimbo." Kimiko says sharply, "Even if you don't... didn't care about that!"

You realise that you've already got a bimbo body, given how busty you are from this strain of the flu.

Another shudder runs through you, as you know a second infection will give you a mind to match your body.

"Exercise will help wake you up." Kimiko suggests. Well, commands, as she slips an arm around your waist and hoists you to your feet.

You feel the benefit immediately, as she walks you out the patio doors. Finding yourself in a garden, with a high wall. You wonder if that's too keep out lewd voyeurs, or to confine you.

"That's Natsuko." She tells you gesturing with her free arm to a similarly busty woman resting against the wall.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/f3/fc/da/...

She babbles something in vietnamese, before descending into helpless giggles. Kimiko barks something sharply to her in Vietnamese, before turning to address you.

"Ignore her, when she's like this." Kimiko says her cheeks flushing. You wonder and worry about what Natsuko said.

"The bimbo effects are worse with the effect of...." she hunts for a word, "with those hormones." She finishes proudly, having found the word.

"So I look like a bimbo." you ask through gritted teeth.

"Yes, but you can still string together a coherent sentence, and aren't obsessed with sex."

"Are you?" she asks risking a slight smile at her own joke.

Another girl smiles at you from the poolside.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/36/b8/a6/...

"Oh, that Akane." Kimiko tells you distantly. "Another bimbo." she adds dismissively.

"You will have to watch not to be mistaken as one yourself. Their prospects are limited, and with a male mind still inside, I doubt you'd enjoy them."

"And her..." you ask finally spotting someone looking more like Kimiko. "Is she here as a precaution..." you ask, "Like yourself?"

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/10/c8/0f/...

A sad shake of the head, "That's Akira. He was a customs officer, and discovered a contaminated package. Now... she... she's waiting to be released too."

"Is there anyone here without a sad story?" you ask trying to keep the conversation light. "She doesn't look too upset."

You gesture to another beautiful woman, not over-ripe body.

https://i.pinimg.com/originals/79/d4/07/...

"Oh... she's like you... he was a tourist."

"She's not big... big, like me." you object before you can stop yourself.

"He wasn't tall as a man, or so..." her voice trails off. Clearly he was skinnier than you were too.

"So he's not a bimbo, could we talk?"

Kimiko shrugs, "How good is your Arabic?"

"Achmed is fighting for the right to stay here, rather than return home..."

She looks slightly confused, "So is she... was he from Saudi Arabia?" you ask.
1555211.title: "You no longer infectious." Kimiko assures you.
